Google Translate Element Initialization
const initGoogleTranslate=()=>{// Remove any existing script

const match=cookieValue.match(/\/en\/([a-z-]+)/);if(match&&match[1]&&match[1]!=='en'){console.log('Detected translated language from cookie:',match[1]);setCurrentLanguage(match[1]);}}};detectCurrentLanguage();},[]);const translatePage=langCode=>{console.log('Attempting to translate to:',langCode);// Use the reliable cookie-based method directly
